archimate:Node.name: [L1 Base] LSSTCAM Forwarders (Node)
archimate:Node.documentation: Forwarder nodes acquire the pixel data. The software design provides for forwarders to "die" -- as they are seleected from a pool (in thsi case for every image). A Robust LSSTCam deployment will have extra forwarders to provide continuous service should a forwarder node fail. For LSSTCam , forwarding nodes perform both the Archiving function, and forwarding data over teh science data link to NCSA.
